node.title: Double murderer who sexually abused 102 corpses sentenced to life in jail
node.description: Families of the victims called him "despicable", "sick and twisted" and an "animal".
node.content: ["Warning: This article contains information that may be disturbing.", "A double murderer who sexually abused more than 100 corpses has been sentenced to life in jail.\u00a0", "David Fuller, 67, killed two women Wendy Knell and Caroline Pierce in 1987 in separate attacks in Kent, England. Fuller also abused 102 corpses during his time working as a hospital electrician in two morgues in Kent. The abuse took place over 12 years between 2008 and November 2020.\u00a0", "Fuller was sentenced at Maidstone Crown Court by Mrs Justice Cheema-Grubb.\u00a0", "During sentencing Justice Cheema-Grubb told Fuller, \"There is so much sorrow in this community because of what you have done\".", "\"Your actions go against everything that is right and humane. They are incomprehensible.", "\"You had no regard for the dignity of the dead.\"\u00a0", "Families of the victims called Fuller \"despicable\", \"sick and twisted\" and an \"animal\" during impact statements, according to The BBC.\u00a0", "In a victim impact statement, Knell's mother Pamela described her daughter as a \"thoughtful person who would do anything for anyone\".", "\"We've had to live with her loss with no other comfort for the rest of our lives,\" she said according to the BBC.\u00a0", "Pierce's mother Katrina Frost also shared a victim impact statement.\u00a0", "Via a court prosecutor, Frost said her daughter's murder was a \"horrific\" nightmare.\u00a0", "\"I can never forget having to identify the badly-damaged body of my own daughter. The images of seeing my daughter in that way, repeat over and over in my mind.", "\"She must have been absolutely terrified.\"", "Fuller was given two life sentences for the murders with a concurrent 12-year term for his other crimes.\u00a0", "Following his arrest in 2020, police officers found video footage in his home of him abusing corpses.\u00a0", "Fuller pleaded guilty to the murders in November. He also admitted to 51 other offences, including 44 offences relating to the morgue abuse.", "He was captured after advances in DNA testing linked him to the crimes.\u00a0\u00a0", "Fuller beat and strangled Knell to death in her home on June 23, 1987. Her body was found by her boyfriend the next day. Months later Fuller abducted and killed Pierce on November 24.\u00a0", "An independent inquiry was launched following his arrest by Health Secretary Sajid Javid. The inquiry will investigate how Fuller got away with his crimes without being caught by the hospital trust.\u00a0\u00a0"]
